Praetically we find that ‘ hic’ and ‘iste’ are opposed, as ‘ 1' and ‘ you‚' and ‘hic' and ‘ille‚’ as ‘near’ and ‘distant.’ And so in reference to things previously mentioned, ‘ille ’ denotes the former or more distant, ‘hic’ the latter or nearer particular.
